channel.title: Keep drops on? Delta
channel.description:
I've found that once I keep my server online for a period of times, the drops tend to turn off. There is a command ::resetdrops which resets the drops obviously. But is there a way to KEEP the drops on?
Positive replies only please.
Thanks.

item.title: Keep drops on? Delta
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

Find something like…
Itemdrop(); or something like that. That code you just posted is useless for your problem. That is how you turn your drops back on. You need to find whats turning your drops off.

look in your itemhandler if you have to.

just realized you are using delta… Forget what i said.

Read full topic

item.title: Keep drops on? Delta
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("resetdrop") && playerRights > 0){ ItemHandler.resetItemDrop(); yell("Drops are now on!"); }

The void:

public static void resetItemDrop() { for(int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) { globalItemID[i] = 0; } }

Read full topic
